stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Automation, Content Creation Addressing the need to test systems using non-production data
benefits: Efficient creation of test data that closely mimics production data, while protecting PII/CUI/etc. (scheduled and/or on-demand), to increase speed and accuracy of system testing

stage: c) Deployed – The use case is being actively authorized or utilized to support the functions or mission of an agency.
problem_solved: Automation, Data Analysis Safeguarding PBGC data and content
benefits: Machine Learning capabilities to enhance IT Security monitoring to protect PBGC assets, people, and data.

use_case_name: Intelligent, auto- generated meeting summaries, notes, and tasks
stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Automation, Content Generation Meeting and task documentation, post meeting analysis, decision tracking, etc. are manual administrative actions that may take time and resources away from focusing on higher benefit activities.
benefits: Automatic, auto-generated information and actions to provide benefit to the personnel in realizing time savings, instant accessibility to summary information, and many additional productivity gains.

stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Content Generation Content (text, audio, image/graphic) generation is a manual activities.
benefits: AI-Assisted training/instructional design creation to boost productivity, reduce training development time, and improve effectiveness and efficiencies of training deployment.

stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Automation, Content Generation Federal contracting/procurement can be an arduous and time- consuming task.
benefits: AI-Assisted contract/acquisition document drafting to save time, resource, and provide better alignment to Agency policies, FAR, etc.

use_case_name: AI-Assisted Recognition and Redaction for Legal/Litigation Matters
stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Automation, Data Analysis Manual review and redaction of audio and images can be labor intensive and potentially error prone.
benefits: AI-Assisted review of audio, image, video, etc. to aid identification of personnel identifiable information (PII) in efforts to provide ethical, privacy protected evidence/information that is searchable and review- ready of legal personnel.

use_case_name: IT Service Management Virtual Agent and Automation
stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Automation, Content Generation Information Technology (IT) incident management is a continuous and at times repetitive, resource-consuming task.
benefits: Automation of routine tasks/IT incident response, providing expanded self service, and provided enhanced data-driven support in efforts to focus human agents to address more complex issues, provide more efficient IT support, enhancing overall productivity and satisfaction, and to provide a more streamline IT incident management capability resulting in potential cost savings/avoidance.

stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.

benefits: Automation of routine tasks, deeper more effective research, more in-depth and efficient data and information analysis, and support of content creation – to enhance overall productivity, freeing up personnel to address more meaningful, critical work.

stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.

benefits: Summarization of Pension Plan information to serve as a context for summary report drafting. Recognition, potential conversion of unstructured data into machine readable data, evaluation/calculation, etc. of Pension Plan Data.

use_case_name: Federal Accounting Statutes and Guidelines Alignment
stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Research, Data Analysis Alignment to Federal Executive Orders, Memorandums, Guidelines etc. to PBGC policies can be intricate, multi-faceted, and may need many sources at once to fully address Federal Financial Management requirements.
benefits: Dynamic, efficient evaluation resulting in summary information for PBGC CFO-Federal Staff to quickly and effectively address updates to Federal guidelines.

use_case_name: IT Security and Privacy Control Assessment
stage: a) Pre-deployment – The use case is in a development or acquisition status.
problem_solved: Research, Data Analysis, Content Creation Referencing Federal Cybersecurity and Privacy guidelines, evaluation of controls, interruption of supporting evidence, and generation of meaning outputs is a constant/fluid initiative that requires substantial resource allocation and time.
benefits: Increase volume of control assessment, reduce manual labor, automate findings generation in efforts – to reduce control tailoring process time, reduce control implementation time, automate selection of application controls, and support rapid drafting of implementation statements.

use_case_name: AI-Assisted Market Financial Health and Credit Analysis
stage: c) Deployed – The use case is being actively authorized or utilized to support the functions or mission of an agency.
problem_solved: Research, Content Generation Monitoring and documenting the financial health and credit ratings of thousands of distressed companies is a complex and information-dense analysis process.
benefits: AI-Assisted financial health and credit analysis; to include the extraction of key insights from relevant articles, earnings reports, contractual/covenant analysis, and even private credit content to improve discovery, provide more robust information/research, and improve the productivity of financial analysts.
